channel.title: Scan Logs Me Out Everytime
channel.description:
New to Smoothwan. On a Slate AX1800.
Every time I go to Network/Simple Wi Fi Setup, and choose Scan on any frequency, it scans and then logs me out. I log back in and it goes to that screen, but if I scan it logs me out. Over and over. Must be a bug? Anything I can do?

item.title: Scan Logs Me Out Everytime
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
Looks like it has been rebooting.
Next version will use an app to be installed on GL.iNet latest firmware to resolve many Wi-Fi issues.

Read full topic

item.title: Scan Logs Me Out Everytime
item.dc:creator: realdeal1977
item.description:
I restored to “factory” and it works now. Not sure what the deal was.

Read full topic
